skills.name: Swordbreaker 1
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a sword user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Swordbreaker 2
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a sword user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Swordbreaker 3
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a sword user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Vantage 1
skills.effect: Unit counterattacks first when attacked at HP ≤ 25%.

skills.name: Vantage 2
skills.effect: Unit counterattacks first when attacked at HP ≤ 50%.

skills.name: Vantage 3
skills.effect: Unit counterattacks first when attacked at HP ≤ 75%.

skills.name: Wary Fighter 1
skills.effect: Prevents follow-up attacks in combat from unit and foes if unit's HP ≥ 90%.

skills.name: Wary Fighter 2
skills.effect: Prevents follow-up attacks in combat from unit and foes if unit's HP ≥ 70%.

skills.name: Wary Fighter 3
skills.effect: Prevents follow-up attacks in combat from unit and foes if unit's HP ≥ 50%.

skills.name: Watersweep 1
skills.effect: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with magic, staff or dragonstone, if unit’s Spd - foe’s Spd ≥ 5, foe can’t counterattack.

skills.name: Watersweep 2
skills.effect: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with magic, staff or dragonstone, if unit’s Spd - foe’s Spd ≥ 3, foe can’t counterattack.

skills.name: Watersweep 3
skills.effect: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with magic, staff or dragonstone, if unit’s Spd - foe’s Spd ≥ 1, foe can’t counterattack.

skills.name: Windsweep 1
skills.effect: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with sword, lance, axe, bow, or dagger, if unit’s Spd - foe’s Spd ≥ 5, foe can’t counterattack.

skills.name: Windsweep 2
skills.effect: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with sword, lance, axe, bow, or dagger, if unit’s Spd - foe’s Spd ≥ 3, foe can’t counterattack.

skills.name: Windsweep 3
skills.effect: If unit initiates attack, no follow-up occurs. Against foe with sword, lance, axe, bow, or dagger, if unit’s Spd - foe’s Spd ≥ 1, foe can’t counterattack.

skills.name: Wings of Mercy 1
skills.effect: Enables unit to warp adjacent to any ally with HP ≤ 30%.

skills.name: Wings of Mercy 2
skills.effect: Enables unit to warp adjacent to any ally with HP ≤ 40%.

skills.name: Wings of Mercy 3
skills.effect: Enables unit to warp adjacent to any ally with HP ≤ 50%.

skills.name: Wrathful Staff 1
skills.effect: If unit has 100% HP at the start of combat, damage from their staff will be calculated the same as other weapons.

skills.name: Wrathful Staff 2
skills.effect: If unit has ≥ 50% HP at the start of combat, damage from their staff will be calculated the same as other weapons.

skills.name: Wrathful Staff 3
skills.effect: Damage from unit's staff will be calculated the same as other weapons.

skills.name: Atk Ploy 1
skills.effect: At start of turn, all foes in cardinal directions with Res 1 or more lower than unit suffer Atk-3 until the end of foe's next action.

skills.name: Atk Ploy 2
skills.effect: At start of turn, all foes in cardinal directions with Res 1 or more lower than unit suffer Atk-4 until the end of foe's next action.

skills.name: Atk Ploy 3
skills.effect: At start of turn, all foes in cardinal directions with Res 1 or more lower than unit suffer Atk-5 until the end of foe's next action.

skills.name: Axe Experience 1
skills.effect: If unit survives, unit gets 1.5x EXP.(If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

skills.name: Axe Experience 2
skills.effect: If unit survives, all axe users on team get 1.5x EXP.(If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

skills.name: Axe Experience 3
skills.effect: If unit survives, all axe users on team get 2x EXP.(If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

skills.name: Axe Valor 1

skills.name: Axe Valor 2
skills.effect: If unit survives, all axe users on team get 1.5x SP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

skills.name: Axe Valor 3
skills.effect: If unit survives, all axe users on team get 2x SP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

skills.name: Breath of Life 1

skills.effect: If unit initiates attack, adjacent allies recover 5 HP after combat.

skills.name: Breath of Life 3
